Pyramids of Giza.description: The last surviving wonder of the ancient world, these pyramids are a testament to the ingenuity of ancient Egyptian civilization.

Valley of the Kings.description: The burial site of pharaohs and powerful nobles of the New Kingdom, including the tomb of Tutankhamun.

Abu Simbel.description: Twin temples carved out of a mountainside, built by Ramses II to commemorate his victory at the Battle of Kadesh.
